content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary, thank you for coming to see the apartment. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would expect a monthly rental price of around 800-900 euros. What is your budget for a monthly rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to negotiate the rental price. Can you give me a lower price?
User 1: Of course, I'm willing to negotiate the rental price. What is your budget for a monthly rental price?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: My budget for a monthly rental price is around 700 euros. Is that possible?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Sure, I can lower the rent to 700 euros per month. I would like to sign the lease agreement immediately.
User 1: I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. I'll prepare the lease agreement for you to sign. Do you have any other questions or concerns before we proceed?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: No, I don't have any other questions or concerns. Thank you for your help.
name: Heinrich Heine
